base.description: Python 3.11 basic environment with common utilities

ml.description: Machine Learning environment with pandas, sklearn, torch, transformers

cuda.description: GPU-accelerated environment with CUDA 12.1 and PyTorch

chemscout.description: Chemistry and cheminformatics environment with RDKit, BioPython, PubChemPy

remotion.description: Video rendering environment with Node.js 20, Chromium, ffmpeg, yt-dlp for Remotion
